sentences.sentence: Many of my clients felt that way about their site (advert, leaflet…).
sentences.translation: 我的很多客户对他们的网站（广告、传单……）都有这样的感觉。

sentences.sentence: I saw an advert in a magazine and I was just calling to get some details.
sentences.translation: 我在一本杂志上看到一个广告，打电话来了解一些细节。

sentences.sentence: We do have to cross our legs every time when Christian Dior advert comes on.
sentences.translation: 每当克里斯汀·迪奥的广告出现时，我们还是不得不翘起二郎腿。
